summary: Allows you to have multiples followers.
descriptionHtml:
This mod will allow you to have multiple followers.
Put the TXT file in your game\'s directory, where the EXE is and type bat followers. This will allow you to bring another follower. For the time being you only can have a temporary companion + another companion, unfortunately...

One the CK is out, I\'ll make a mod without the need of this freaking console, or I\'ll use Script Dragon.
Cheers!
author: Sagittarius22
